revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=EX6200 |revision=-100NAS |series=AC1200 |upc=606449099751 |asin=B00HQ883QW |fcc_date=12/05/2013 |manuf_country=Vietnam |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |manuf_model=U12H269 |manuf_rev=T00 |type=range extender |fcc_id=PY313200230 |ic_id=4054A-13200230 |pcb_id=U12H269T00 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4708A0;BCM4708A0KFEBG, TT1315 P10, 281397-05 B1B; |cpu1_cspeed=800 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L6406E |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B1G1646G-BCH9 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4352;BCM4352KMLG, TE1311 P20, 273012 3 W; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43217;BCM43217KMLG, HT1313 P10, 276786 6 W; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=5 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Richwave;RTC6649E;088, 649E, 310;2; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC w/ Power Detector;Skyworks;SE5003L1;;2; |flags=DFS, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=NETGEAR_EXT |default_ssid_regex=^NETGEAR_EXT$ |default_ip=192.168.1.250 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password }} {{TagLine|AC1200 Dual Band WiFi Range Extender}} :[http://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/wifi-range-extenders/EX6200.aspx Product page] {{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=EX6200}} "U12H269T00", "801494", and "REV: 0 GP" is silkscreened on the board. *OEM: [[Foxconn]] ([[Ambit]]) [https://github.com/mirror/dd-wrt/blob/master/src/router/netgear/ambitCfg-ex6200.h U12H269T00] *OEM: U12H269T01 The default SSID for this device seems to be '''NETGEAR_EXT'''. ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32355-netgear-ex6200-ac1200-high-power-wifi-range-extender-reviewed ''Netgear EX6200 AC1200 WiFi Range Extender'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM4708A0 or BCM4708A1 (guess) *2.4GHz Radio: [[Broadcom]] BCM43217 2x2 802.11bgn :''Richwave'' RTC6649E - 2.4GHz Power Amp (088 649E 310) *5GHz Radio: [[Broadcom]] BCM4352KMLG 2x2 802.11an/ac :''Skyworks'' SE5003L1 - 5GHz Power Amplifier (23dBm) *[https://openitforum.pl/index/recenzje/network/apoints/netgear-ex6200-r223/ ''Netgear EX6200'' Reviewed on '''OpenITforum'''] ===CES 2014 coverage=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces-2014/32299-netgear-ces-2014-announcements ''NETGEAR CES 2014 Announcements'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] ===Serial=== ====Pinout==== The serial header is '''J252'''. This applies for U12H269T01. 
              J252
(GND) (RxD) (TxD) (3.3)
Pin1  Pin2  Pin3  Pin4
__NOTOC__
